data.title: SquirrelWaffle/Qakbot Loader Behavior
data.description: SquirrelWaffle is delivered through a dropper, a malicious Excel or Word document, which contains XLM macros that execute PowerShell to retrieve and launch the SquirrelWaffle loader. This query hunts for the dropper's attempt to do so. As of December 30, 2021, the latest attacks using this method are attributed to Qakbot, and this query hunts for Qakbot's attacks as well.
data.value: EndpointOS = "windows" AND EventType = "Process Creation" AND SrcProcName In Anycase ("excel.exe", "winword.exe") AND TgtProcDisplayName In ("Microsoft(C) Register Server","Windows host process (Rundll32)") AND TgtProcCmdLine Contains Anycase ".ocx" AND NOT TgtProcCmdLine Contains Anycase "Windows\system32\msscript.ocx"
data.skylight: i.scheme='edr' and meta.event.name in ('PROCESSCREATION')   and ((endpoint.os in:anycase ('windows')) AND (event.type in:anycase ('Process Creation')) AND (src.process.name in:anycase ('excel.exe', 'winword.exe')) AND (tgt.process.displayName in:matchcase ('Microsoft(C) Register Server', 'Windows host process (Rundll32)')) AND (tgt.process.cmdline contains:anycase '.ocx') AND NOT((tgt.process.cmdline contains:anycase 'Windows\\system32\\msscript.ocx')))

data.title: SquirrelWaffle Loader Known Versions
data.description: Hunt for known file names of the SquirrelWaffle loader. The list is subject to updates as new versions of SquirrelWaffle loaders with other file names are being detected in the wild.
data.value: EndpointOS = "windows" AND EventType = "Process Creation" AND TgtProcDisplayName = "Microsoft(C) Register Server" AND TgtProcCmdLine in Contains Anycase ("test.test","test1.test","test2.test","good.good","good1.good","good2.good","ww1.dll","ww2.dll","ww3.dll","ww4.dll","ww5.dll","besta.ocx","bestb.ocx","bestc.ocx","volet1.ocx","volet2.ocx","volet3.ocx","tot1.ocx","tot2.ocx","tot3.ocx","rex1.ocx","rex2.ocx","rex3.ocx")
data.skylight: i.scheme='edr' and meta.event.name in ('PROCESSCREATION')   and ((endpoint.os in:anycase ('windows')) AND (event.type in:anycase ('Process Creation')) AND (tgt.process.displayName = 'Microsoft(C) Register Server') AND (tgt.process.cmdline contains:anycase ('test.test', 'test1.test', 'test2.test', 'good.good', 'good1.good', 'good2.good', 'ww1.dll', 'ww2.dll', 'ww3.dll', 'ww4.dll', 'ww5.dll', 'besta.ocx', 'bestb.ocx', 'bestc.ocx', 'volet1.ocx', 'volet2.ocx', 'volet3.ocx', 'tot1.ocx', 'tot2.ocx', 'tot3.ocx', 'rex1.ocx', 'rex2.ocx', 'rex3.ocx')))

data.title: Vulnerable Log4j2 versions (CVE-2021-44228)
data.description: Hunt for known hashes of the vulnerable log4j library. A machine that returns results will likely run an application that is vulnerable (yet, in some cases, the library might not be in use / might run in a non-exploitable context) to CVE-2021-44228. Applications that match this query should be updated.
data.skylight: i.scheme='edr' and meta.event.name in ('FILESCAN','FILERENAME','FILEDELETION','FILECREATION','FILEMODIFICATION','MALICIOUSFILE')   and (tgt.file.sha1 in:matchcase ('678861ba1b2e1fccb594bb0ca03114bb05da9695', '7621fe28ce0122d96006bdb56c8e2cfb2a3afb92', '4363cdf913a584fe8fa72cf4c0eaae181ef7d1eb', '2e8d52acfc8c2bbbaa7baf9f3678826c354f5405', '895130076efaf6dcafb741ed7e97f2d346903708', '13521c5364501478e28c77a7f86b90b6ed5dbb77', '31823dcde108f2ea4a5801d1acc77869d7696533', 'c707664e020218f8529b9a5e55016ee15f0f82ac', '58a3e964db5307e30650817c5daac1e8c8ede648', '0d99532ba3603f27bebf4cdd3653feb0e0b84cf6', 'a5334910f90944575147fd1c1aef9f407c24db99', '7ed845de1dfe070d43511fab321784e6c4118398', 'a7cb258b9c36f49c148834a3a35b53fe73c28777', '2b557bf1023c3a3a0f7f200fafcd7641b89cbb83', '00a91369f655eb1639c6aece5c5eb5108db18306', 'a3f2b4e64c61a7fc1ed8f1e5ba371933404ed98a', '2be463a710be42bb6b4831b980f0d270b98ff233', '4ac28ff2f1ddf05dae3043a190451e8c46b73c31', '979fc0cf8460302e4ffbfe38c1b66a99450b0bb7', 'ff857555cec4635c272286a260dbd7979c89d5b8', '8c59f9db4e5eebf7e99aa0ed2eb129bd5d8ef4f8', '989bbd2b84eba4b88a4b2a889393fac5b297e1df', '3b1c23b9117786e23cc3be6224b484d77c50c1f2', '38b9c3790c99cef205a890db876c89fd9238706c', '5bcfefcd7474c2f439576a1839ea0aeeec07f3b6', '73fe23297ccf73bad25a04e089d9627f8bf3041f', 'c28f281548582ec68376e66dbde48be24fcdb457', 'ef568faca168deee9adbe6f42ca8f4de6ca4557b', '5eb5ab96f8fc087135ef969ed99c76b64d255d44', '16f7b2f63b0290281294c2cbc4f26ba32f71de34', '6556d71742808e4324eabc500bd7f2cc8c004440', '94bc1813a537b3b5c04f9b4adead3c434f364a70', 'c476bd8acb6e7e55f14195a88fa8802687fcf542', 'e7dc681a6da4f2f203dccd1068a1ea090f67a057'))

data.title: [1] Applications embedding vulnerable Log4j2 versions (CVE-2021-44228)
data.description: This is one query out of an eight queries that can be used to hunt for hashes that are likely to contain one of the vulnerable (CVE-2021-44228) log4j libraries inside their software bundle. This list was made based on intelligence hunting and might still have false positives, although we believe it can be trusted. In some cases, the library might not be in use or might run in a non-exploitable context. Applications that match these queries should be updated.

data.title: Suspected exploitation of unpatched Windows privilege escalation flaw (CVE-2021-36934)
data.description: Looks for suspected unpatched Windows privilege escalation flaw (CVE-2021-36934)
data.value: IndicatorName = "VssCredsHarvesting" and SrcProcIntegrityLevel in ("MEDIUM", "LOW","INTEGRITY_LEVEL_UNKNOWN")
data.skylight: i.scheme='edr' and meta.event.name in ('BEHAVIORALINDICATORS')   and ((indicator.name = 'VssCredsHarvesting') AND (src.process.integrityLevel in:anycase ('MEDIUM', 'LOW', 'INTEGRITY_LEVEL_UNKNOWN')))

data.title: SolarWinds (Serv-U) activity - process creation
data.description: Looks for suspected SolarWinds (Serv-U) activity - process creation
data.value:
--Serv-U
EndpointOS = "windows" AND EventType = "Process Creation" AND SrcProcName Contains anycase "Serv-U" and TgtProcName In Contains Anycase ("mshta.exe", "cmd.exe","powershell")

data.title: SolarWinds (Serv-U) activity - C2 communication
data.description: Looks for suspected SolarWinds (Serv-U) activity - C2 communication

data.title: Kaseya Ransomware Detection
data.description: Looks for Kaseya REvil Ransomware Attack Patterns
data.value:
--Kaseya
EventType = "Process Creation" and SrcProcName Contains Anycase "cmd.exe" and TgtProcName Contains Anycase "ping.exe" and SrcProcCmdLine RegExp "/c ping 127.0.0.1 -n \d+ > nul \&.*MpPreference"

data.title: Hunting Query for Suspected PrintNightmare Exploit Attempts
data.description: Looks for suspected PrinterNightmare patterns
data.value:
--PrintNightmare
EventType In ( "File Rename","File Creation" ) AND TgtFilePath Contains Anycase "spool\drivers\x64" AND TgtFilePath Contains Anycase "Old" AND TgtFilePath Contains Anycase "dll" AND TgtFileIsSigned != "signed" AND AgentMachineType In ( "Server" )

data.title: Hafnium Suspicious Process Spawn
data.description: Looks for Hafnium Suspicious Process Creation
data.value:
--hafnium
EventType = "Process Creation" and (SrcProcName In AnyCase ("umworkerprocess.exe", "umservice.exe") or (SrcProcName In Anycase ("w3wp.exe") and SrcProcCmdLine Contains Anycase "MSExchange")) and TgtProcImagePath Contains Anycase "system32" and not TgtProcName in anycase ("wermgr.exe", "werfault.exe")

data.title: Hafnium File Creation
data.description: Looks for Hafnium File Creation artifacts
data.value:
--hafnium
EventType In ("File Creation", "File Modification") AND TgtFileExtension contains anycase "aspx" AND SrcProcName In AnyCase ("umworkerprocess.exe", "umservice.exe", "w3wp.exe") AND TgtFilePath RegExp "((inetpub\\wwwroot\\aspnet_client\\(system_web)?)|(FrontEnd\\HttpProxy\\owa\\auth)|(FrontEnd\\HttpProxy\\ecp\\auth))"

data.title: China Chopper Web Shell
data.description: China Chopper Web Shell
data.value:
--hafnium
EventType = "Process Creation" And SrcProcName Contains Anycase "w3wp.exe" and TgtProcName Contains Anycase "cmd.exe" And TgtProcCmdLine Contains Anycase "[s]&cd&echo [e]"

data.title: Windows Webshell Process Spawning
data.description: Looks for generic webshell creation on Windows  Servers. This query may require tuning for your environment.
data.value: EventType = "Process Creation" And SrcProcName Contains Anycase "w3wp.exe" and TgtProcName in Anycase ("cmd.exe", "powershell.exe", "net.exe", "quser.exe","certutil.exe", "arp.exe","hostname.exe", "whoami.exe", "netstat.exe", "ping.exe", "ipconfig.exe", "wmic.exe", "del.exe")
data.skylight: i.scheme='edr' and meta.event.name in ('PROCESSCREATION')   and ((event.type in:anycase ('Process Creation')) AND (src.process.name contains:anycase 'w3wp.exe') AND (tgt.process.name in:anycase ('cmd.exe', 'powershell.exe', 'net.exe', 'quser.exe', 'certutil.exe', 'arp.exe', 'hostname.exe', 'whoami.exe', 'netstat.exe', 'ping.exe', 'ipconfig.exe', 'wmic.exe', 'del.exe')))

data.title: CMD Unnecessary Escaping
data.description: Detects a category of Powershell escaping using carets which is designed to otherwise bypass detection.
data.value: EventType = "Process Creation" and SrcProcCmdLine RegExp "[a-zA-Z]\^[a-zA-Z]" and (SrcProcName Contains Anycase "cmd.exe" or SrcProcDisplayName = "Windows Command Processor") and not (TgtProcName In Contains Anycase ("conhost.exe") or TgtProcCmdLine RegExp "[a-zA-Z]\^[a-zA-Z]")
data.skylight: i.scheme='edr' and meta.event.name in ('PROCESSCREATION')   and ((event.type in:anycase ('Process Creation')) AND (src.process.cmdline matches '[a-zA-Z]\\^[a-zA-Z]') AND ((src.process.name contains:anycase 'cmd.exe') OR (src.process.displayName = 'Windows Command Processor')) AND NOT(((tgt.process.name contains:anycase ('conhost.exe')) OR (tgt.process.cmdline matches '[a-zA-Z]\\^[a-zA-Z]'))))

data.title: LOLBAS Shell32
data.description: As a type of Living off the Land attack, attackers can use shell32 (through rundll32) to execute dll payloads
data.value: EventType = "Process Creation" AND SrcProcName In AnyCase ("rundll32.exe") AND SrcProcCmdLine Contains Anycase "shell32.dll" AND (TgtProcName In AnyCase ("cmd.exe") AND TgtProcCmdLine Contains " /c ")  AND NOT (SrcProcParentName = "msiexec.exe" OR SrcProcCmdLine Contains "RunAsNewUser_RunDLL Local" OR SrcProcCmdLine RegExp "Control_RunDLL .*\.cpl" OR SrcProcCmdLine Contains "InetCpl.cpl,ClearMyTracksByProcess" OR SrcProcCmdLine Contains Anycase ":\autorun.bat" OR SrcProcCmdLine Contains "OpenAs_RunDLL")
data.skylight: i.scheme='edr' and meta.event.name in ('PROCESSCREATION')   and ((event.type in:anycase ('Process Creation')) AND (src.process.name in:anycase ('rundll32.exe')) AND (src.process.cmdline contains:anycase 'shell32.dll') AND ((tgt.process.name in:anycase ('cmd.exe')) AND (tgt.process.cmdline contains:matchcase ' /c ')) AND NOT(((src.process.parent.name = 'msiexec.exe') OR (src.process.cmdline contains:matchcase ('RunAsNewUser_RunDLL Local', 'InetCpl.cpl,ClearMyTracksByProcess', 'OpenAs_RunDLL')) OR (src.process.cmdline matches 'Control_RunDLL .*\\.cpl') OR (src.process.cmdline contains:anycase ':\\autorun.bat'))))

data.title: LOLBAS Rundll32
data.description: As a type of Living off the Land attack, attackers can use Rundll32 to execute scripts such as JavaScript
data.value: TgtProcName Contains Anycase "rundll32.exe" and (TgtProcCmdLine Contains Anycase "mshtml,RunHTMLApplication" or TgtProcCmdLine Contains Anycase "javascript:") and EventType = "Process Creation"
data.skylight: i.scheme='edr' and meta.event.name in ('PROCESSCREATION')   and ((tgt.process.name contains:anycase 'rundll32.exe') AND ((tgt.process.cmdline contains:anycase ('mshtml,RunHTMLApplication', 'javascript:'))) AND (event.type in:anycase ('Process Creation')))

data.title: LOLBAS regsvr32
data.description: As a type of Living off the Land attack, attackers can use regsvr32 to load code from URLs in an attack known as Squiblydoo
data.value: TgtProcName Contains Anycase "regsvr32.exe" and TgtProcCmdLine Contains Anycase "/s /u /n /i:http" and TgtProcCmdLine Contains Anycase "scrobj" and EventType = "Process Creation"
data.skylight: i.scheme='edr' and meta.event.name in ('PROCESSCREATION')   and ((tgt.process.name contains:anycase 'regsvr32.exe') AND (tgt.process.cmdline contains:anycase '/s /u /n /i:http') AND (tgt.process.cmdline contains:anycase 'scrobj') AND (event.type in:anycase ('Process Creation')))

data.title: LOLBAS mshta
data.description: As a type of Living off the Land attack, attackers can use MSHTA to load arbitrary javascript or vbscript code
data.value: TgtProcName Contains Anycase "mshta.exe" and (TgtProcCmdLine Contains Anycase "javascript:" or TgtProcCmdLine Contains Anycase "about:" or TgtProcCmdLine Contains Anycase "<script>" or TgtProcCmdLine Contains Anycase "vbscript:Execute")  and EventType = "Process Creation"
data.skylight: i.scheme='edr' and meta.event.name in ('PROCESSCREATION')   and ((tgt.process.name contains:anycase 'mshta.exe') AND ((tgt.process.cmdline contains:anycase ('javascript:', 'about:', '<script>', 'vbscript:Execute'))) AND (event.type in:anycase ('Process Creation')))

data.title: LOLBAS CMSTP
data.description: Silently installs a specially formatted local .INF without creating a desktop icon. The .INF file contains a UnRegisterOCXSection section which executes a .SCT file using scrobj.dll.
data.value: TgtProcName Contains Anycase "cmstp.exe" AND TgtProcCmdLine Contains Anycase " /s " AND EventType = "Process Creation"
data.skylight: i.scheme='edr' and meta.event.name in ('PROCESSCREATION')   and ((tgt.process.name contains:anycase 'cmstp.exe') AND (tgt.process.cmdline contains:anycase ' /s ') AND (event.type in:anycase ('Process Creation')))

data.title: Unamanged Powershell
data.description: System.Management.Automation DLL use by Non Microsoft-Signed Binaries
data.value: ( SrcProcName  not in ("powershell.exe","powershell_ise.exe") and modulepath contains anycase "System.Management.Automation" ) AND not ( SrcProcPublisher In ("MICROSOFT DYNAMIC CODE PUBLISHER", "MICROSOFT CORPORATION", "MICROSOFT WINDOWS") AND SrcProcVerifiedStatus = "verified" )
data.skylight: i.scheme='edr' and meta.event.name in ('MODULELOAD')   and (((!(src.process.name in:matchcase ('powershell.exe', 'powershell_ise.exe'))) AND (module.path contains:anycase 'System.Management.Automation')) AND NOT(((src.process.publisher in:matchcase ('MICROSOFT DYNAMIC CODE PUBLISHER', 'MICROSOFT CORPORATION', 'MICROSOFT WINDOWS')) AND (src.process.verifiedStatus in:anycase ('verified')))))

data.title: Powershell Unnecessary Escaping
data.description: The use of a backtick to escape which do not need escaping is needless, and is usually seen when an attacker is trying to obfuscate code to bypass detection and alerting.
data.value: TgtProcDisplayName containscis "powershell" and TgtProcCmdLine regexp "`[cdeghijklmopqsuwxyz]" and EventType = "Process Creation"
data.skylight: i.scheme='edr' and meta.event.name in ('PROCESSCREATION')   and ((tgt.process.displayName contains:anycase 'powershell') AND (tgt.process.cmdline matches '`[cdeghijklmopqsuwxyz]') AND (event.type in:anycase ('Process Creation')))

data.title: Suspicious Data Compression
data.description: Advesaries may create an encrypted rar archive with specific compression level.
data.value: EventType = "Process Creation" and TgtProcCmdLine  contains anycase "-hp" and TgtProcCmdLine regexp "\sa\s.*\s-hp[^\s]+\s" and TgtProcCmdLine regexp "\sa\s.*\s-m[0-5]+\s"
data.skylight: i.scheme='edr' and meta.event.name in ('PROCESSCREATION')   and ((event.type in:anycase ('Process Creation')) AND (tgt.process.cmdline contains:anycase '-hp') AND (tgt.process.cmdline matches '\\sa\\s.*\\s-hp[^\\s]+\\s') AND (tgt.process.cmdline matches '\\sa\\s.*\\s-m[0-5]+\\s'))

data.title: Removal of Indicators on Host
data.description: The USN jounral provides a list of filesystem changes to userspace programs, and its deletion is used for hiding tracks
data.value: EventType = "Process Creation" AND TgtProcName Contains Anycase "fsutil" AND TgtProcCmdLine Contains Anycase " usn " AND TgtProcCmdLine Contains Anycase " deletejournal"
data.skylight: i.scheme='edr' and meta.event.name in ('PROCESSCREATION')   and ((event.type in:anycase ('Process Creation')) AND (tgt.process.name contains:anycase 'fsutil') AND (tgt.process.cmdline contains:anycase ' usn ') AND (tgt.process.cmdline contains:anycase ' deletejournal'))

data.title: DHCP Callout
data.description: Detects the installation of a Callout DLL via CalloutDlls and CalloutEnabled parameter in Registry, which can be used to execute code in context of the DHCP server
data.value: RegistryKeyPath Contains Anycase "Services\DHCPServer\Parameters\Callout"
data.skylight: i.scheme='edr' and meta.event.name in ('REGKEYCREATE','REGKEYDELETE','REGVALUEMODIFIED','REGVALUECREATE','REGKEYRENAME','REGVALUEDELETE','REGKEYEXPORT','REGKEYSECURITYCHANGED','REGKEYIMPORT')   and (registry.keyPath contains:anycase 'Services\\DHCPServer\\Parameters\\Callout')

data.title: Sunburst DLL hash
data.description: Look for known hashes of the Sunburst backdoor DLL
data.skylight: i.scheme='edr' and meta.event.name in ('FILESCAN','FILERENAME','FILEDELETION','FILECREATION','FILEMODIFICATION','MALICIOUSFILE')   and (tgt.file.sha1 in:matchcase ('76640508b1e7759e548771a5359eaed353bf1eec', 'd130bd75645c2433f88ac03e73395fba172ef676', '1acf3108bf1e376c8848fbb25dc87424f2c2a39c', 'e257236206e99f5a5c62035c9c59c57206728b28', '6fdd82b7ca1c1f0ec67c05b36d14c9517065353b', '2f1a5a7411d015d01aaee4535835400191645023', 'bcb5a4dcbc60d26a5f619518f2cfc1b4bb4e4387', '16505d0b929d80ad1680f993c02954cfd3772207', 'd8938528d68aabe1e31df485eb3f75c8a925b5d9', '395da6d4f3c890295f7584132ea73d759bd9d094', 'c8b7f28230ea8fbf441c64fdd3feeba88607069e', '2841391dfbffa02341333dd34f5298071730366a', '2546b0e82aecfe987c318c7ad1d00f9fa11cd305', '2dafddbfb0981c5aa31f27a298b9c804e553c7bc', 'e2152737bed988c0939c900037890d1244d9a30e', 'fd15760abfc0b2537b89adc65b1ff3f072e7e31c'))

data.title: Sunburst DLL loaded into memory
data.description: Look for processes that load the Sunburst backdoor DLL

data.title: Sunburst DNS query and response
data.description: The backdoor in sunburst sends a DNS request, we can look for this request coupled with a response
data.value: DnsResponse Contains Anycase ".avsvmcloud" AND DnsRequest In Contains Anycase ("appsync-api", "avsvmcloud.com")
data.skylight: i.scheme='edr' and meta.event.name in ('DNS')   and ((event.dns.response contains:anycase '.avsvmcloud') AND (event.dns.request contains:anycase ('appsync-api', 'avsvmcloud.com')))

data.title: Sunburst - Solarwinds starts CMD with suspicious parameters
data.description: Look for instances of the exploited solarwinds process that start cmd.exe with 'echo' in the command line
data.value: EventType = "Process Creation" AND SrcProcName Contains Anycase "SolarWinds.BusinessLayerHost.exe" AND TgtProcName Contains Anycase "cmd.exe" AND TgtProcCmdLine Contains Anycase "echo"
data.skylight: i.scheme='edr' and meta.event.name in ('PROCESSCREATION')   and ((event.type in:anycase ('Process Creation')) AND (src.process.name contains:anycase 'SolarWinds.BusinessLayerHost.exe') AND (tgt.process.name contains:anycase 'cmd.exe') AND (tgt.process.cmdline contains:anycase 'echo'))

data.title: Sunburst - Solarwinds starts Powershell with base64 command line
data.description: Look for instances of the exploited solarwinds process that start powershell.exe with base64 in the command line
data.value: EventType = "Process Creation" AND SrcProcName Contains Anycase "SolarWinds.BusinessLayerHost.exe" AND TgtProcName Contains Anycase "powershell.exe" AND TgtProcCmdLine RegExp "[\s\('\"]((?:[A-Za-z0-9+/]{4})*(?:[A-Za-z0-9+/]{2}==|[A-Za-z0-9+/]{3}=|[A-Za-z0-9+/]{4}){10})"
data.skylight: i.scheme='edr' and meta.event.name in ('PROCESSCREATION')   and ((event.type in:anycase ('Process Creation')) AND (src.process.name contains:anycase 'SolarWinds.BusinessLayerHost.exe') AND (tgt.process.name contains:anycase 'powershell.exe') AND (tgt.process.cmdline matches '[\\s\\(\'\"]((?:[A-Za-z0-9+/]{4})*(?:[A-Za-z0-9+/]{2}==|[A-Za-z0-9+/]{3}=|[A-Za-z0-9+/]{4}){10})'))

data.title: Traffic to Sunburst C&C
data.description: Look for traffic to the known sunburst C&C
data.value: Url Contains Anycase "avsvmcloud.com" AND not SrcProcName In AnyCase ("chrome.exe", "msedge.exe", "iexplore.exe", "firefox.exe", "opera.exe")
data.skylight: i.scheme='edr' and meta.event.name in ('HTTP')   and ((url.address contains:anycase 'avsvmcloud.com') AND NOT((src.process.name in:anycase ('chrome.exe', 'msedge.exe', 'iexplore.exe', 'firefox.exe', 'opera.exe'))))
